 2022-00202022-01-04,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2021-0898 of August 26, 2021 by removing “Senior Associate Deputy Minister of Diversity, Inclusion and Youth, Canadian Heritage, to be concurrently” before the title “Deputy Minister of Women and Gender Equality”, and adding after that title, “to be styled as Deputy Minister of Women and Gender Equality and Youth”, effective January 10, 2022. (Gina Wilson)
AttachmentsAttachment
